about_the_game:
About This Game

Dive into the Shadows of Forgotten History

Step into the shoes of an urban explorer with a taste for the mysterious and macabre in Occultus Vitae. What starts as a thrilling journey into abandoned places and whispered legends quickly descends into a harrowing struggle for survival. Do you have what it takes to uncover the truth, escape the horrors, and keep your sanity intact?

A World of Secrets Awaits

As a seasoned adventurer of the unseen, you’re drawn to places others fear to tread. Legends, conspiracy theories, and forbidden tales are your lifeblood. When you hear a chilling rumor of a Nazi experiment gone horribly wrong beneath a forgotten castle, your curiosity gets the better of you.

Explore the underground laboratory rumored to have been the site of a failed Nazi experiment in black magic—a place where something monstrous was unleashed, leaving only death and madness in its wake.

Key Features

  • Immersive Exploration: Roam through hauntingly detailed environments, from decrepit castle halls to the depths of a forsaken underground lab. Every shadow hides a story, and every creak of the floorboards hints at something sinister.

  • Deeply Engaging Story: Uncover the chilling truth behind an experiment that blurred the lines between science and the occult. Confront your fears as you piece together the twisted events of the past.

  • Psychological Horror: As you delve deeper, reality begins to blur. Face unspeakable horrors that test your sanity, making you question what’s real and what’s not.

  • Challenging Survival Gameplay: Solve intricate puzzles, evade relentless threats, and manage your resources wisely to escape the terrors lurking in the shadows.

  • Atmospheric Sound Design: A spine-tingling soundtrack and immersive sound effects create an ambiance of dread and tension, pulling you deeper into the nightmare.

A Game That Fights Back

In Occultus Vitae, you’re not just exploring; you’re surviving. Every decision matters, every sound could mean danger, and every shadow might hide the unknown. As the lines between legend and reality blur, you’ll find yourself racing against the dark forces unleashed decades ago.

Will you uncover the truth, or will the darkness consume you?

Prepare for a journey into fear, mystery, and survival like no other. Add Occultus Vitae to your wishlist now, and be ready to face the shadows!

content_descriptors.notes:
Occultus Vitae contains themes and visuals intended for mature audiences. These include:

Graphic Violence: Depictions of blood, injuries, and disturbing imagery in line with the horror setting.
Psychological Horror: Themes of mental distress, fear, and hallucinations.
Strong Language: Occasional use of mature language in dialogue and environmental storytelling.

This content aims to enhance the atmosphere and narrative depth but may not be suitable for all players. Viewer discretion is advised.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 9900K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 70 GB available space

short_description: A psychological horror adventure where you explore abandoned locations and unravel dark legends. Set in a remote castle hiding a Nazi black magic experiment gone wrong, you'll face haunting environments, challenging puzzles, and a fight to survive the horrors lurking within.
